TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 事件或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event or event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件方法，并且它表明连接过程已开始 （例如，用户已选择了某个控件并单击连接谓词），但尚未完成。The event is raised by the method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed. 事件提供完成之前取消连接的机会。The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功完成，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 引发事件方法，并且它表明这一事实，用户已单击了断开连接的谓词，或方法已被调用。The event is raised by the method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the method has otherwise been called. 事件提供的机会将取消该过程的完成之前结束连接。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功结束，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the event. 中指定的方法时，将调用委托或引发事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when a or event is raised. 页面开发人员可以通过添加添加自定义事件的处理程序`OnWebPartsDisconnecting`并`OnWebPartsConnecting`属性到``元素，并通过为属性指定自定义方法名称。Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes. 此外可以通过编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关如何订阅事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 引发和使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events.md)。For more information about how to subscribe to an event, see [How to: Raise and Consume Events](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events.md).
